searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
url = "https://m.bxetv.com/api/search";
r = java.ajax(baseUrl);
s = r.match(/var\s\w+\s*=\s*"\w+";/g).join('');
eval(s);
var bd = {
  "method": "POST",
  "body": `q=${key}&vw=${vw}&abw=${abw}&ru=${ru}&jrt=${jrt}&van=${van}&fw=${fw}&cwl=${cwl}&gpr=${gpr}&uyoo=${uyoo}&tz=${tz}&euu=${euu}&tsn=${tsn}&eju=${eju}&um=${um}&fp=${fp}&dvm=${dvm}&jpk=${jpk}&deblkx=${deblkx}&ht=${ht}&azy=${azy}&sna=${sna}&wqx=${wqx}&fpp=${fpp}&rup=${rup}&jwj=${jwj}&bgt=${bgt}&qp=${qp}&yf=${yf}&cw=${cw}&wq=${wq}&sign=${sign}`
};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
$=java.getString('.leftx@html')
n = 0; 
v = book.getVariable("custom");
x = v.match(/^\d+$/)? v : n;
//x = (parseInt(x) < $.length)? x : n;

name=java.getString('.bookTitle@text');
author=`{{book.author}}`;
last=java.getString('#list-chapterAll@a@text')
kind=java.getString('.col-md-12@p.1@text')

if (v == 0) {
  bookUrlz = baseUrl;
  book.type = 8;
  java.toast('å·²è‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å¯å°è¯´æ¨¡å¼');
} else if(v==1){
  bookUrlz =String(java.getString('.leftx@a@onclick')).replace(/.*\(\'(.*?)\'\)/,'$1');
  book.type = 128;
  java.toast('å·²è‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å¯æ–‡ä»¶æ¨¡å¼');
}
intro = " ç®€ä»‹ï¼š" + java.getString('.bookIntro@text') + "\nå½“å‰æºé“¾: " + "\n"+bookUrlz+"\nä¹¦ç±æ–‡æœ¬:ğŸ”º'+ã€0ã€‘+'ğŸ”»"+'\n'+baseUrl+
"\næ–‡ä»¶é“¾æ¥:ğŸ”º'+ã€1ã€‘+'ğŸ”»"+'\n'+String(java.getString('.leftx@a@onclick')).replace(/.*\(\'(.*?)\'\)/,'$1');
data = {
	name:name,
	author:author,
	last:last,
	kind:kind,
	intro:intro,
	bookUrl:bookUrlz
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function d(a, b) {
            b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString();
            var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16));
            var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16));
            return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)
        }
match=src.match(/\.html\((d.*?"\))/);
//java.log(match[1])
if(match){
result=eval(match[1])}else result
</js>

pi=baseUrl.replace(/^(.*?)\.html/,'$1')
res = java.getString("#pagelink@a.-1@html").match(/class\=\"last\"\>(.*?)\</);

    data.push(pi + '/' +i  );
}
data;
</js>
